issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, reducing prescription drug costs, protecting Medicare and Medicaid

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for Green New Deal principles, supporting renewable energy transition and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Supports ending mass incarceration, reducing mandatory minimum sentences, promoting rehabilitation programs

issues.title: Voting Rights Protection
issues.description: Strong opponent of voter suppression, supports expanding voter access and combating discriminatory voting laws

issues.title: Economic Inequality
issues.description: Advocates for raising minimum wage, supporting workers' rights, implementing progressive tax policies

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Education Investment
issues.description: Supports increasing education funding, reducing student debt, expanding access to community colleges and trade schools
